name: Inertia (itch) (Iuvenisprod)
description:
Inertia is a quick, local multiplayer, party game experience, where you play against each other, and against the drones.  A simple experience that requires you to focus on defending yourself, and simultaneously watch for lasers, bombs, powerups etc. And attempt to kill your opponent.

Every wave the platform turns to put either you or your opponent upside down.

"Kill your friends in style" - Einstein

Thank you to - Zawouff on Instagram for the ideas :)
